package.name: smacc_viewer
package.description: The cmach viewer is a GUI that shows the state of hierarchical SMACC state machines. It can visualize the possible transitions between states, as well as the currently active state and the values of user data that is passed around between states. The smacc viewer uses the smacc debugging interface based on the smacc messages to gather information from running state machines.
package.author: Jonathan Bohren
